Product Title: The Tunnel

Product Description: ['When a prominent French politician is found dead on the border between the UK and France, detectives Karl Roebuck (Stephen Dillane) and Elise Wassermann (Clйmence Poйsy) are sent to investigate on behalf of their respective countries. raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for engaging, humorous content, consistently rating comedy and drama films between 4.6 and 5.0. Common themes in their selections highlight a desire for light-hearted narratives paired with elements of nostalgia and charm, as evidenced by the enjoyment of films that resonate with both older and younger audiences. The user appreciates quality humor and heartfelt moments, often noting emotional reactions like laughter or warmth.

Quality is paramount, as reflected in their high ratings for films perceived as funny and poignant, while moderate ratings indicate discontent with overly talkative or bland storytelling. The shopper favors products with strong ensemble casts, suggesting a preference for ensemble-driven narratives that feature well-developed characters.

Price sensitivity appears low, implying an inclination towards premium content rather than budget options. This person enjoys films that balance humor with an emotional core, as well as those containing unexpected twists, showcasing a penchant for storytelling that defies predictability. Overall, they seek an entertaining viewing experience that combines laughter, depth, and quality performances.

target_interaction.title: Lovely Story with ALL the Feels!
target_interaction.text: A wonderful, easy going, uplifting movie! Great cast! Perfect date night or family night movie!  Grab your S.O and cuddle up!
